detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Eli! Please teach me ballet! Lanzhu heard from Karin that you give very helpful advice because you’re experienced in ballet.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Karin said that? Fufu, I’m flattered. I can teach if you don’t mind.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu will try to take in everything, so teach me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You’re really a fast learner, Lanzhu. I don’t think there’s anything left I could-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Hold on! Teach me more, Eli! Lanzhu is convinced now that you’re an amazing dancer! So Lanzhu wants to learn from you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>O-, okay, I understand. You don’t have to get so close to me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Thank you, Eli!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>In return, you can teach me something you’re good at, Lanzhu. I’d love to learn something from you too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaaah! We’re teaching each other like best friends already! Sure! Let’s both improve each other!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
